attributes.action: Don't Pay £1.7bn extra to EU or I'll join UKIP
attributes.additional_details: The purpose of this ePetition is to test the Conservatives metal with a challenge, and that is to see if they can actually stand up to Europe and say "NO the UK is not paying the £1.7bn extra to EU".

rejection.details: We have already received a similar e-Petition that we are currently considering and will publish in due course.
